title: My First Blog Post
summary: Welcome to my first blog post! In this post, I will share some thoughts about building this portfolio website using React.
content: Welcome to my first blog post! In this post, I will share some thoughts about building this portfolio website using React. Building a portfolio using React was an exciting journey where I explored the fundamentals of component-based development, routing, and styling with modern tools. I decided to use Vite for faster development and hot module replacement, which saved me a lot of time. Throughout this journey, I learned about state management, conditional rendering, and creating reusable components. This is just the beginning of my web development journey!

title: Learning React
summary: In this post, I'll walk you through some key concepts I learned while building a project with React and Vite.
content: In this post, I'll walk you through some key concepts I learned while building a project with React and Vite. When I started this project, I focused on setting up a development environment using Vite because it provided a fast and efficient workflow. I explored JSX syntax, learned about React hooks like useState and useEffect, and got hands-on experience with routing using React Router. One of the challenges I faced was managing state between components, which led me to explore different state management approaches. Overall, it was a fantastic experience diving deeper into the React ecosystem!
